title: Looking for 2 more people from Bronze-Gold for some Fun Ranked 5's !

replies.body: Top lane tanks, mid lane (control mages) bot lane tristana or supprt anything, if jungle rammus

Top laner here. rarely lose lane.
Add me, then we will have at least 2 winning lanes ;)
hey, just sent you an add. I pref mid but am i competent top and jg as well. hopefully play in next few days :)
Just sent you an invite, keen for some chill games and I can play any role pretty well. Top/mid/jung my best roles in that order.
If you guys are still taking people I can play mid?
I can try play top if you want...although I only play one champ if thats ok :)

Hey I can play mid lane for you :)
ign Celestite
Hey man I can top and jungle can play mid not that good. Cant play today but will add you tomorrow if you want !!!
